body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_BILLING_PROD_DSCNT
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.39.41.336331000 PM -06:00 */
AS

FUNCTION add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2
,data_source_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_prod_dscnt_cd IN VARCHAR2
,billing_prod_dscnt_desc IN VARCHAR2
,billing_prod_dscnt_long_desc IN VARCHAR2
,discount_val IN VARCHAR2
,discount_type_cd IN VARCHAR2
,discount_usage_cd IN VARCHAR2
,discount_cycle_num IN NUMBER
,discount_periods_num IN NUMBER
,free_months_num IN NUMBER
,zero_rate_subscriber_count_ind IN NUMBER
,free_for_lifetime_ind IN NUMBER
,billing_prod_dscnt_vld_strt_dt IN DATE
,billing_prod_dscnt_vld_end_dt IN DATE
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
) RETURN NUMBER
IS
l_return_pk NUMBER;
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_dscnt.add(fx), parms=' || source_system_id || '|' || data_source_type_cd || '|' || billing_prod_dscnt_cd || '|' || billing_prod_dscnt_desc || '|' || billing_prod_dscnt_long_desc || '|' || discount_val || '|' || discount_type_cd || '|' || discount_usage_cd || '|' || discount_cycle_num || '|' || discount_periods_num || '|' || free_months_num || '|' || zero_rate_subscriber_count_ind || '|' || free_for_lifetime_ind || '|' || billing_prod_dscnt_vld_strt_dt || '|' || billing_prod_dscnt_vld_end_dt || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_billing_prod_dscnt a
(
a.billing_prod_dscnt_id
,a.source_system_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_cd
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_desc
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_long_desc
,a.discount_val
,a.discount_type_cd
,a.discount_usage_cd
,a.discount_cycle_num
,a.discount_periods_num
,a.free_months_num
,a.zero_rate_subscriber_count_ind
,a.free_for_lifetime_ind
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_vld_strt_dt
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_vld_end_dt
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
chtr.s_billing_prod_dscnt_id.NEXTVAL
,add.source_system_id
,add.data_source_type_cd
,add.billing_prod_dscnt_cd
,add.billing_prod_dscnt_desc
,add.billing_prod_dscnt_long_desc
,add.discount_val
,add.discount_type_cd
,add.discount_usage_cd
,add.discount_cycle_num
,add.discount_periods_num
,add.free_months_num
,add.zero_rate_subscriber_count_ind
,add.free_for_lifetime_ind
,add.billing_prod_dscnt_vld_strt_dt
,add.billing_prod_dscnt_vld_end_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
) RETURNING a.billing_prod_dscnt_id INTO l_return_pk;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_dscnt.add(fx)');
RETURN l_return_pk;

END add;

,source_system_id IN VARCHAR2

,billing_prod_dscnt_long_desc IN VARCHAR2

,free_months_num IN NUMBER

,add.discount_periods_num
,add.free_months_num

,add.billing_prod_dscnt_vld_end_dt
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_dscnt.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_dscnt_id IN NUMBER

,billing_prod_dscnt_long_desc IN VARCHAR2
,discount_val IN VARCHAR2

,discount_usage_cd IN VARCHAR2

,discount_periods_num IN NUMBER

)

BEGIN

(

,a.source_system_id
,a.data_source_type_cd
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_cd
,a.billing_prod_dscnt_desc

,a.discount_val
,a.discount_type_cd
,a.discount_usage_cd

)

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,billing_prod_dscnt_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_billing_prod_dscnt.del, parms=' || billing_prod_dscnt_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_billing_prod_dscnt a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.billing_prod_dscnt_id = del.billing_prod_dscnt_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_billing_prod_dscnt.del');

END del;

END da_billing_prod_dscnt;
